page.title: 16Post and Telephones
page.content: Only one{Post Office}serves the area. It is situated in the centre of Rangemore village, in Chapel Lane, and it is also the village store. As it is the only post office in the area it is very necessary and important for collecting Old Age Pensions, Family Allowances, and all other State Benefits. All the usual facilities of a post office are available here. A{post collecting box}can also be found on Tatenhill Common, about a mile away. Nearly everyone has their own {telephone}in this area and this is necessary as the village is small and many of the houses are scattered. There are two{public telephone {boxes.}One is in Rangemore village, and the other is on Tatenhill Common.
